page.title: 08SHERBORNE FETE 1985
page.content: The fete was held on Saturday July 13th. It started at 2.00pm,but it was all set up in the morning.Shortly after the fete started,the children of Sherborne school did some country dancing.Later the morris men and lady clog dancers did their dancing.In between,music was played by Chedworth Silver Band. There was a competition for the best dressed teddy bear. There were many stalls and attractions, including pony rides, raffles, a treasure hunt, and welly wanging ( which involves throwing a wellington boot as far as possible). It was a very hot day and many ice-creams and drinks were sold. It finished at 5 o'clock and everyone enjoyed themselves.
